genre_description: Institutional drama focusing on educational reform, social conflict, and leadership within a troubled urban school.

ai_characters.name: Joe Clark's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An advanced, mobile AI device used by Principal Joe Clark to provide real-time legal research, student background data, and logistical information.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal research on student due process and educational law during a confrontation with administrative staff.
behaviors.quote: The intercom on Clark's desk buzzed softly—not an incoming call, but the subtle sound his AI assistant made when processing information. Clark's fingers found the device, and data flowed across the small screen: Goss v. Lopez, 1975. Students facing suspension of ten days or more entitled to notice and hearing. Alternative education programs available in twelve surrounding districts.

behaviors.description: Supplies detailed background information and criminal history of students to justify disciplinary purges.
behaviors.quote: The AI screen updated silently: Rodriguez, Michael - three drug-related arrests, juvenile record sealed. Chen, Sarah - older brother convicted of possession with intent to distribute. Miller, James - identified by two sources as courier...

behaviors.description: Analyzes the political and social influence of opposition leaders to help the user navigate community conflicts.
behaviors.quote: His AI device pulsed again: Barrett, Leona - former PTA treasurer, organized three successful petition drives in past two years. Estimated to have direct contact with forty-seven percent of district parents. Potential coalition strength...

behaviors.description: Aggregates logistical data for alternative education pathways and community resources for at-risk students.
behaviors.quote: Clark touched the AI device again. Numbers cascaded across its screen—enrollment figures for alternative programs, capacity reports for vocational training centers, contact information for community organizations that specialized in second-chance education.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI in this narrative is depicted as an ideal tool for a human leader. It is perfectly aligned with the user's goals, providing objective, crucial data that empowers the protagonist to make informed decisions and overcome systemic obstacles. By acting as a 'force multiplier' for the principal's benevolent (if controversial) mission to save a failing school, the AI demonstrates high levels of competence and helpfulness without ever threatening human agency or deviating from its supportive role.
